channel.title: MongoDB on Matt Snider

item.title: Surf Media Gmbh
item.description: Designed, implemented and tested web services for an advertising performance network in a Deis-based microservices architecture REST APIs and message consumers using Java/Dropwizard and Python/Flask/DRF AngularJS-based frontend Developed a SOCKS5 proxy server to interface with devices as part of our automated ad-testing infrastructure Mentored more junior coworkers through pair programming & code reviews
